item.description:
Sorry for the delay in notice. As mentioned last month, the selection for this month is Alexader Dumas' "The Three Musketeers" See you soon!

 

 

Hello club!!! I have to move the time by 30 min!! I will be there ASAP I will be traveling from Rocky Hill and may be a little later that 7 pm!!!

group.name: The Hartford Area Book Club Meetup Group

item.name: Three cheers for the Musketeers!
